text: setochinimi befetachihuna gizeyachewini bederesu gize bemekakelachewi behigi betewadedu gize balochachewini kemagibati atasitegwagulwachewi፡፡ yihi (mekelikeli) ke’inanite be’alahina bemech’ereshawi k’eni yemiyamini sewi berisu yigesets’ibetali፡፡ yihi hunetachihu le’inanite belach’i newi፤ (kemet’erit’eri) at’irimi newi፡፡ alahimi yawik’ali፤ inanite gini atawik’umi፡፡
